title: Banyan Tree Bintan Celebrates 20 Years A celebratory package and epicurean Soul Food Weekend awaitsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Banyan Tree Bintan Celebrates 20 Years A celebratory package and epicurean Soul Food Weekend awaits Published on : Friday, September 4, 2015
In 1995, Banyan Tree launched its first resort in Bintan, featuring
tropical villas ingeniously raised on stilts with endless views of the South China Sea. Since then,
Banyan Tree Bintan has blossomed into the quintessential island-getaway resort. To
commemorate 20 years, the hotel has launched a celebratory package with special treats for
dining and activities for stays from now till 18 December 2015. In addition,
as November 20th
marks its 20-year anniversary, an exclusive palate-pleasing weekend has been created for guests
to share in this joyous occasion.
For over two decades, Banyan Tree Bintan has been wholly committed to delivering intimate,
romantic and rejuvenating escapes. With 26 notable awards won to date, including Condé Nast
Traveller UK Readers’ Travel Awards 2002 – The World’s Top 100, Pacific Asia Travel Association
Gold Awards 2005, Travel + Leisure’s India Best Awards – Best Boutique Hotel 2013, this testifies
of Banyan Tree Bintan’s dedication in offering guests an unrivalled experience every time. With
the passing of 20 years, it warrants a trip down memory lane with your loved ones to relive the
cherished moments made at this rustic luxurious retreat. Akin to a homecoming of sorts, Banyan
Tree invites guests to return to a place filled with a sense of familiarity, evoking memories of
warmth and love.
Book the Sense of Celebration Package at our Best Available Rate from now till 18 December
2015 with a minimum stay of two consecutive nights and enjoy the following inclusions:
 Daily buffet breakfast for two at Treetops
 Return private car transfer between Bintan Ferry terminal and the resort
 20th Anniversary gift from Banyan Tree Gallery
 20% off Spa (except Facial & Beauty Treatments)
 20% off F&B (except for In-Villa Dining and Destination Dining)
 20% off Laguna Golf
 20% off Water Sports activities
Source:- Banyan Tree
